aesDescription: Encrypt or Decrypt AES encrypted messages
noText: No text provided to encrypt / decrypt
base64Description: Encode text to base64 or Decode base64 to text
base64DetailedDescription: Use -d or --decode to decoded encoded text
desDescription: Encrypt a message with DES or decrypt a DES message
rabbitDescription: Encrypt text with the Rabbit Cipher or decrypt Rabbit encrypted text
RC4Description: Encrypt messages by using the RC4Drop cipher or decrypt RC4Drop encrypted messages
